pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit Regularization Path for Generalized Additive Models // Using overlap grouped-lasso penalties, 'gamsel' selects whether a term in a 'gam' is nonzero, linear, or a non-linear spline (up to a specified max df per variable). It fits the entire regularization path on a grid of values for the overall penalty lambda, both for gaussian and binomial families. See doi:10.48550/arXiv.1506.03850 for more details.
